title.rendered: 10 Yoga Poses to do Every Day

content.rendered:
10 Yoga Poses to do Every Day

10 Yoga Poses You Should Do Every Day

Learn more

Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned yogi, we’ve collected ten yoga poses perfect for your daily routine.

You can also customize these poses to be as gentle or intense as you need. 

Learn more

1. Bridge Pose

This pain-relieving stretch helps a variety of skill levels achieve deep rejuvenation.

Learn more

2. Downward Facing Dog

Provides pain relief benefits as well as a deep stretch to get you ready for your day.

Learn more

3. Mountain Pose

A basic move that you’ll need to master before moving on to more complex poses.

Learn more

4. Child’s Pose

Stretches your lower back, hips, thighs, knees, and ankles.

Learn more

5. Chair Pose

Strengthen thigh muscles and feet and increase ankle mobility.

Learn more

6. Tree Pose

This exercise merges balance and core strength with a one-legged stretch.

Learn more

7. Savasana

It looks easy, but this meditative pose is a conscious relaxation exercise.

Learn more

8. Locust Pose

A backbend that manages back pain and stretches tense muscles.

Learn more

9. Legs Up
the Wall

Gives the benefits of inversion without complicated headstands.

Learn more

10. Warrior

This position summons forth strength, focus, confidence, and courage like its namesake the warrior.

Learn more

Click the link below for more detailed instructions

Get the Workout!
